trans-unit.source: You create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event to customize how profile property values are validated.
trans-unit.target: 创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件以自定义如何验证配置文件属性值。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event is raised when profile properties are set for a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>为用户设置配置文件属性时将引发事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: If any property values fail validation, add them to the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何属性值未通过验证，则将它们添加到集合中<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法返回集合中的<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>属性，以便你能够确定哪些属性未能通过验证。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection that contains profile properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含未通过验证的配置文件属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The FailedProperties property contains a collection of the names of the properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: FailedProperties 属性包含未通过验证的属性名称的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you add the names of the properties that fail validation to the collection in the FailedProperties property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件，你将添加到 FailedProperties 属性中的集合的验证失败的属性的名称。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the FailedProperties property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法 FailedProperties 属性中返回的集合，以便你可以确定哪些属性未能通过验证。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The profile properties that have failed validation.
trans-unit.target: 未通过验证配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of names and values of the profile properties to validate.
trans-unit.target: 获取名称的集合和要验证的配置文件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The Properties property returns an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains the names and values of the profile properties to set for the user.
trans-unit.target: 属性的属性返回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>对象，其中包含的名称和要为用户设置的配置文件属性的值。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you can retrieve the properties to validate from the Properties property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>事件，你可以检索要从 Properties 属性验证的属性。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties>

trans-unit.source: If any values fail validation, add them to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何值未通过验证，将其添加到<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>方法返回集合中的<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A>属性，以便你能够确定哪些属性未能通过验证。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The names and values of the profile properties to validate.
trans-unit.target: 名称和要验证的配置文件属性的值。
